name: P384.Signing
desc: A mechanism used to create or verify a cryptographic signature using the NIST P-384 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA).

items.name: struct P384.Signing.PrivateKey
items.desc: A P-384 private key used to create cryptographic signatures.

items.name: struct P384.Signing.PublicKey
items.desc: A P-384 public key used to verify cryptographic signatures.
